(11) CHI: i v - i v r i
`Go home ­ I want to go home.'
(11) CHI: i v - i v r i
`Go home ­ I want to go home.'
CHI: i v-i v r i
Go home ­ I want to go home.
DAD: i v - i v i - không i cu tut na h? cu tut na không?
go home ­ go home IMP ­ not go slide more right? slide more no?
`Go home, let's go home. You don't go on the slide anymore? Any more slid?
DAD: i v - i v i - không i cu tut na h? cu tut na không?
go home ­ go home IMP ­ not go slide more right? slide more no?
`Go home, let's go home. You don't go on the slide anymore? Any more slid?
DAD: i v-i v i-không i cu tut na h? cu tut na không?
go home ­ go home IMP ­ not go slide more right? slide more no?
Go home, let's go home. You don't go on the slide anymore? Any more slid?
(12) CHI: v - vit ri ­ vit - vit ri - vit (child makes very demanding sounds) vit (9x)
draw ­ write Asp ­ write ­ write Asp ­ write ..... write
`Draw - I want to write ­ write ­ I want to write ­ write .... write (9x)'
(12) CHI: v - vit ri ­ vit - vit ri - vit (child makes very demanding sounds) vit (9x)
draw ­ write Asp ­ write ­ write Asp ­ write ..... write

CHI: v-vit ri ­ vit-vit ri-vit (child makes very demanding sounds) vit
draw ­ write Asp ­ write ­ write Asp ­ write..... write
Draw - I want to write ­ write ­ I want to write ­ write .... write (9x)
DAD: h? cái gì? h? h? cái gì ây? Kimbi ly i, li ay 3x, li hung ba `n ming ba ly, hung ba ming
huh? what? huh? huh? what's the matter? Kimbi take IMP ­ come here ­ come kiss Daddy a piece
`.....Kimbi, take (it) ­ come here ­ come here give Daddy a kiss.'
